post_summaries.description: The Instagram post by drcarlamnicola is a graphic with the title "12 Ways The Divine Speak to You." It features a stylized image of a flower with twelve different symbols and phrases arranged around it, each representing a different way the divine communicates. These include "vivid dreams," "de ja vu," "synchronicities," "repeating names, words, phrases," "songs, music," "intuition, inner knowing," "1111 numbers," "un"expected meetings," "smells," "finding, losing or breaking objects," "animals," and "pain, illness, accidents." The graphic has a blue and gold color scheme.
The image shows a box of Patchi "Les Essentiels" chocolates. The caption thanks a friend for an "amazing breakfast."
The image shows a table set with plates, bowls, and baskets, possibly for a buffet or catered event. There's also a toaster oven in the background.
The image shows a selfie of a woman with blonde curly hair wearing a pink hat. The location tag is "Giulio Cercato," and the caption is "Beautiful."

The Instagram post by drcarlamnicola is a collage of images. Several images feature luxury cars (red, white, yellow), some are selfies of the poster, and one appears to be a shot inside a shopping mall. There is also a photo of "Grecia"
The image shows a selfie of drcarlamnicola. In the background, there are other people sitting in what appears to be a bus or train. Another image shows a jar labeled "Grecia" (Greece).
